article_title: Competition, waves just right for water skiing
article_text:
Janet Piercy competes in the State Games’ water skiing competition on Saturday at Championship Lake. The 70-year-old is also the sport’s director during the Games, and runs the event out of her home near the lake.

Posted:

Posted in Sports, Local-sports on Saturday, July 19, 2014 1:00 am.

og.description: A group of Cornhusker State Games participants found a way to enjoy lake time while also competing for medals and preparing for national competition. Water skiing enthusiasts in Nebraska didn’t want to waste a day like Saturday at Championship Lake.
